name: Santa Industries
description:
This game was made for the Secret Santa Game Jam 2021.

Help out Santa to deliver the presents before dawn on christmas eve. Explore the village and talk to the kids to find out about their wishes and where they live so you can properly deliver in time. With the help of your jetpack and hi-tech sleigh you should be able to get it done and save christmas. 

A quirky mix of platforming, logical deduction with a tiny bit of exploration.
